DOC.brief_summary: An open-label , single arm study estimate rate failure Enbrel® SureClick™ Auto-injector RA subject .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Study Assess Rate Failure Enbrel® ( Etanercept ) SureClick™ Auto-Injector Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis RA subject 18 year old Currently take etanercept prefilled syrinx least 4 week Subjects must give write informed consent Subjects must able read write English Subject use adequate contraception Subject pregnant breast feeding Significant concurrent medical disease
